titleStmt.title: SII 8.180: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 180. (A.R. No. 585 of 1902). ON THE EAST WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti . śrīmaNmakāmaṇṭalīcuraṉ pūpālakopālaṉ puvaṉekavīraṉ camarakolākalaṉ sattiya
pālaṉ cetumūlalakṣāpurantaraṉ mūvarāyirakaṇṭaṉ paṭṭarmāṉaṅkāttāṉ Iṟantakālam meṭu
tta cuntarattoḻuṭaiyār māvalivāṇātarāyar piṟutuviIrāṭciyam paṇṇi Aruḷāniṉṟa cakāt=taM
1000 4 100 5 10 2ṉ mel cellāniṉṟa maṉmataṣaMvaṟṣarat=tu makara Ut=tarāyaṇat=tu pūṟuvapakṣat=tu pra
tamaiyum pūcamum peṟṟa cukkiravārattu nāḷ tirukkāṇaipperkūṟṟattu tirukkāṇaipper nayi
ṉār tirukkāṉaipperuṭaiya nāyaṉār kāḷaiyār comanātaṟku tiruppaṇimāṟṟu Uḷḷiṭṭa veṇṭum
nittiyanimantaṅkaḷukkum nam perāl kaṭṭiṉa cuntarattoḻuṭaiyāṉcantikkum viṭṭa te
vatāṉamāvatu keraḷaciṅkavaḷanāṭṭu kiḻaittiruttiyūrmuṭṭattu veṟṟiyūr melaiyūr kiḻaiyūr
Uḷpaṭṭa paṟṟil paḻantevatāṉam nikki Aṉṉiyūr tecaṅkuḷam koṭuṅkuḷam maṟṟum pala
Ēntalkaṭṭu Uḷpaṭa EllaiĀvaṉa . kiḷpāṟkellai Iṉnayiṉār paḷantevatāṉamāṉa virai mel
lellaikku meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai Iṉnayiṉār paḷantevatāṉamāṉa kallakuḻi El
laikku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai kālvāy Ellaikkum Iṉnayiṉā
r paḻantevatāṉamāṉa māḷuvakaṇṭaṉ Ellaikku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkel
lai mayittaṉipaṭṭukkum veppaṅkuḷattil Ellaikku teṟkum Āka yicain
ta perunāṉkellaik kuḷpaṭṭa palavūrkaḷil Uḷḷūr nayiṉār Uḷkkiṭait tevatāṉa
mum muṉṉāḷ naṭantuvarukiṟa Innāyaṉār paḻantevatāṉamum nikki maṟṟuṇṭā
ṉa Ūrkaḷukku māttāl varicai Ikkoyilil civakkoḻuntāle nellu
kalamākavum Iruntatu kuṭiyum palapaṭṭaṭai payiṅkuṭi Oṉṟukku paṇam muṉṟā
kavum Eṉṟeṉṟaikkum Iṟuttu Ituvum Āyam paṭṭaṭai Ivai Ellām
Ikkoyil paṇṭārattile cantiṟātittavarai cella caṇṭecurapiṟamā
ṇam paṇṇikuṭuttom Iṟantakālameṭutta cuntarattoḻuṭaiyārāṉa
māvalivāṇātarāyarom Ippaṭi Āṇṭavar tiruvuḷampaṟṟiyaruḷiṉa tiruvuḷappaṭikku Ittiruvi
ti rāyamavalaṅkāranampi Eḻuttu . Inta
Ūrkaḷ kal veṭṭivitteṉ maturaiutaiyavaḷanāṭṭut tirupparaṅkuṉṟam Āṇṭapiḷḷai tirume
ttaḷi cetiparāyaṉeṉ . Inta kal veṭṭiṉeṉ ciraṅkaṉ Aḻakiyamaṇavāḻat tipatarāyar Iḷai
yanāyaṉ pūma ṉeḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 8.180 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
